name: The Beast Within (Xeltide)
description:
Description:

Every day, David must spend his time fortifying his cabin to prevent himself from leaving at night, when he turns into a werewolf. Gather as many supplies as possible, in an attempt to barricade yourself in, to protect the village below.

Note: If you're having performance issues in Chrome, Firefox seems to be able to run it more smoothly.

Controls:

WASD (or ZQSD) - Movement.

E - Pick up items.

F - Drop items.

Left Mouse Button - Place traps/obstacles.
